title: Do you remember all your pentakills? I don't!
body:
While talking with my friends about our pentakills over our lol career, we realized that we don't remember all of them and/or with who we did them. 

Pentakills are seen as a feat and a special event that we want to remember. At the moment, it is possible to know for the regular season via our private stats but our stats vanished when the season ends. It would be great to have a wall of fame with the champion we got our pentakills, knowing how many and with which champion we got them. 

It would be a nice feature and it will be easier to remember them and share your stories behind them when you can have a tracking.

What do you guys think about this?
(Sorry for any mistakes)

replies.body:
I remember all of my pentakills.

All 1 of them.

I usually play tanks either in the jungle or top lane, so I rarely get the opportunity to get a lot of kills in a game, and when I do it's usually off of solo kills or ganks that translate into building tankier and not necessarily more damage. I do also play mages a bit, but I'm usually content just sitting back and throwing out spells for damage and not really caring about who gets the kills.

You just described my League career right there :P

Jungle/top tank main, most of the kills are from ganks, killing the enemy carry in a fight, or catching people out. Gold goes to stacking defense, you leave the kills to the carries when you can. The occasional Xerath/Vel'Koz mid is all wave-clear, poke, zone, and picking out squishy targets in fights.

And only 1 penta-kill ever since I started in pre-season 3: a typical Master Yi clean-up.
That's funny. I also started in pre-season 3 and my one pentakill was also on Master Yi.

Katarina and Yi mains would have quite the extensive list, given that with their resets it's not really that hard to get pentas.

The best pentakill I've ever seen, though...  I have a screenshot of, of all things, Ziggs Bot getting a penta in a co-op vs. AI game.
share

> [{quoted}](name=Trylobyte,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OaQjzyAF,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2016-04-17T15:33:42.300+0000)
>
> Katarina and Yi mains would have quite the extensive list, given that with their resets it's not really that hard to get pentas.
> 
> The best pentakill I've ever seen, though...  I have a screenshot of, of all things, Ziggs Bot getting a penta in a co-op vs. AI game.

By popular demand...

It's not the best screenshot since I didn't see it coming at all, but here it is.  We did the usual 'camp around the platform and kill the bots while minions take the nexus' thing, but Ziggs Bot was having none of THAT.  Check the chat window for confirmation.


Edit:  This working any better?
http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad350/BobTheBard/ZiggsBotOPCropped_zpsnxuppy2d.png

(Full-size)
http://i950.photobucket.com/albums/ad350/BobTheBard/ZiggsBotOP_zpsddnobshj.png

Had a Fiddlesticks SOLO five other bots.  
Better nerf Irelia.
Oh please share this screenshot!
It's posted in the thread...  I think.  Hard to say, Photobucket's being weird today.
Thank you, yeah photobucket wasn't showing so it only showed the text but no pictures, oh my that penta kill!
My friend underestimated the power of a Intermediate Darius Bot, I couldn't breathe. Just watching that last dunk was pure joy.

My first penta(s) where with Caitlyn, where I got 2 pentas in 1 game. I later got a penta with Jinx too but I'm a terrible adc. 

1/2 pentas I remember was my first time Syndra, where I got a 5 man stun and proceeded to get last hits on 4 of them with my team giving me the 5th. (my Red buff actually last hitted on kill too so I was very lucky).

The second penta that I actually remember what happened was with Katarina (har har, it's so easy to get a Penta with Kat). There was a teamfight in the chokepoint from blue/river on baron side, and I showed up a bit late. I circled around and picked up an easy tiple on their mage/support/tank, but their Tristana was uber fed and had taken out everyone but our Kayle (who had already ulted) and I. Kayle tried dueling Tristana while I killed their jungle Udyr. Kayle dies, I have <300 hp, I throw my combo at Tristana and she is left with <100 hp, at which point I flash to escape her jump onto me (into the blue bush to remove vision) and is able to q + auto her before her aa set off after warding.

The only one I remember is my very first one on rift.

I got it playing ADC Lulu. No lie.

I will never remember getting pentas... because I never got one before.

Sincerely, a support main since the start of season 3.

Yep because I have so few.

I only have one true pentakill on summoners rift (I have two unofficial pentas and one on howling abyss).

I was playing prerework {{champion:22}} with {{item:3043}} . I am late to a fight the enemy team is beating my team.. I walk in hit my focus crit with {{item:3043}} then {{item:3087}} bounces it to the whole enemy team. instant quadra, but my team is now dead as well then the enemy {{champion:4}} tries to b in a bush that is warded. i pick him off for the penta.
It is all about micromanagement, who to kill first, and last, and how to kill them.
Or people stealing it from you. Thanks to my friend i missed a couple.

I remembered all of mine too.. Because I only got pentas for a few champ :') feelsbadman

{{champion:55}} I got a lot for her, I lost count (and I know ppl will be like 'nah kat easy penta meh'. idc, Kat is my beloved main, you guys can throw more hate and everything, but I know bronze Kata and Challenger Kata has a lot of difference)
{{champion:84}} got her penta once. This is before she's nerfed (E still procs Q, W still gives armor. Ppl might give salt to me too. "haha akali easy penta lol" Idc. She used to be my main (not anymore) but as always, bronze akali would have so much difference compared to challenger Akali)
{{champion:222}} Once. We didn't even team fight. I just came to push mid together with Sona and I killed all of them. Sona didn't even ult for me LOL(only heals and movement speeds). Pretty sure I was only 5/0 before that penta. 

Millions of quadra, never penta:
{{champion:92}} It's either because I died before killing the last or someone killed one before me killing my first multi-kill. 
{{champion:11}} I know, you guys will mock me because Yi is such an easy penta champion, but nope. Its either someone killed one first or the last enemy (my penta) is mia...

feelsbadman
I remember maybe 1/3 or half of them. I wish this game tracked more lifetime stats, I like that kind of stuff.

My only penta was with Khartus in aram... And I recorded it...

Now just hoping one day I can get a penta as Teemo since I already got 4 quadras in my lol career.

I had 2 or 3 penta? I know I had two because I got one with MF and Lulu. Felt good for that 1 second then stopped caring about penta.

Winning>penta
I did one friday with xerath in poro king :D

I think I still remember all of them:
My first was with Master Yi, ironically in Hexakill mode. Damn Quinn was faster than me!
The second one was with Yasuo. I got the last kill by Q-ing an invisible Shaco.
The third one was with Kassadin, where I got the last kill with ~100 hp and an Ultimate at the cost of 1200 mana.
My most recent one (I think) was with Vel'Koz. We lost the teamfight, I was the only one to escape. I already got a kill in the fight, but was running away from 4 enemies, all kinda low. I plopped my whole combo with Ult and killed them nearly instantly
I remember mine like it was yesterday. It was 2 seasons ago in a bot game :)

I do because I'm mostly a support player and rarely get the opportunity. 
It was a Pentakill on Sona. In URF mode, btw.

Two quadras on Varus, that's it.

I actually made a list of every character I ever got a pentakill with.  I can remember the circumstances that lead to getting them, too!

The list:

Twitch
Brand
Swain
Vayne
Teemo
Nasus
Heimerdinger
Pantheon
Yasuo
Karthus x2
Tristana
Vladimir
Master Yi (Hexakill)
Ryze
Annie
Orianna
Caitlyn
Hecarim
Talon
Kennen
Fizz
Miss Fortune
Sivir

The best on this list had to be my first Karthus penta.  I essentially 1v5ed due to them pulling out a baron attempt, ulted after dying and he yells "SURRRRENNNDDDEEERRRRRRRRRRR!"  It killed all five of them and they did indeed surrender.

that is a great idea and not only penta our every kill single,double,triple,and quadra
pleasr make that happen
The only penta i ever got was playing J4 when i was fed out of my mind and one shot everyone

...when you only had one pentakill in normals (against bots I can't remember), you remember it.
{{champion:21}}

3 of them.

First with Draven back in season 4, then about a month ago two more within a week, one on ARAM with Cho'Gath and another one on SR with Kog'Maw.

I've had about five since season 3. Only one on the Rift though.

Lux - ARAM
Annie - ARAM
Nidalee - Hexakill (And was damn near a Hexa too. I was pissed. XD)
Katarina - ARAM
Jinx - Summoner's Rift

I play a lot of ARAM. :D

Got 3 
2 of which with assassins (kha'zix and talon)
And the last one with mord :D

I remember 2 of my pentas. My very first which was as Wukong playing ARAM. The other one was on the rift playing Draven with my friends. We were 3v5 in the enemy jungle and had a screw it let's go moment (it was a normal). I can't remember who they were playing but they were champs with CC and I had just hit 6. Fight was such a mess nobody knew what was happening until PENTAKILL popped up. The enemy team gave me O_O in the chat and a wtf just happened and my friends were shouting their OMG's at me on Skype.

{{champion:429}} I've gotten my fair share with her

{{champion:67}} I've gotten several with her, 1 2v5, and one where I dove fountain solo. Was totally worth

{{champion:114}} I've gotten a couple, one where our Leona stole it. But because we were so behind because I fed Renek, I didn't really care. We won that game :P

{{champion:131}} The only champion I've gotten a 1v5 with http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/1975197081/228572094?tab=overview, I remember that game because I was duoing with Tahm, but that's another time.

{{champion:119}} 1 cleanup, hardly a 1v5, 2 other pentas some other time. I once got a triple with one ulti though

{{champion:104}} because he was busted, still is though.
I dont remember mine tbh I have a bad memory. I did recently get one in an ARAM as Trist at level 3 (keep in mind you start at level 3).

Yes, I write them down. Lol. :D
Yasuo x7
Zed x4
Yi x5
Katarina x3
Annie x1 (first game too! Lol)
Ryde x2
Draven x4
Jinx x2
Kalista x1
Graves x1
Azir x2
Lucian x1
Shaco x1
Twitch x1

There is a few more, but this is when I started recording them. Got my first penta ever with yasuo almost exactly 4 years ago. These pentas range over 4 years on 3 different accounts.

Pentas I remember in no order:

{{champion:1}}  Got my first penta kill on Hexakill ironicly, but I was so excited I got a penta that I didn't care that the Zed on their team never connected, I had played Annie about 2 years prior to my first penta with her, it's still one of my favorite moments cause my husband feared the enemy team and ulted as fiddlesticks and I dropped tibbers and blasted everything, it was fun.
{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}  I've gotten 3 penta's with Ammumu on ARAM and nearly 2 in one game! I only play him on ARAM though.
{{champion:432}} Accidental penta with him. Instead of playing him tanky I went ap attack speed. Once I got one with him on purpous by landing my ult under the enemy tower and tanked them to death haha
 {{champion:53}}  I know I got one on blitz but I don't remember anymore how, I do know that there was a yasuo that walked into me and died by lighting and that gave me the penta. I had to sit still at the fountain as I laughed my ass off that he just stood there not knowing which top bush I was in and died haha.
{{champion:57}} I've only gotten one as Maokai, and it was with {{item:3748}} , the wave after activating it killed 2 adc's and chunked the mage that I went after, ulted and got the tank after my husband feared them away from a health pack on ARAM, it was a lotta fun and one of the hardest I've ever had.

{{champion:11}} Many moons ago I got a penta on yi but i don't remember what map it was on,  just remember I got one of my first with him, if nto the first.
Not anymore, i used to becuase penta kills used to be something you get when you outplay the enemy team, now they're just things that you see one in 10 matches because of the bullshit snowball meta
it's like poker..you always remember the bad hands..and always forget the good hands:))

My first pentakill came about a month ago and is my only penta to date despite having played the game since season 2. I was playing volibear jungle, and I didn't even realize I had a penta till the words popped up on the screen "Pentakill". What a hoot that was. Boy oh boy was that ever lovely. The game turned out to be a really hard one to win though in the end since voli isn't really a late game champ and the other team were no slouches, they were simply caught being a bit too aggressive under our turret.

The one I have gotten I am the most proud of is tping to the enemy base as Garen to try ending the game while the other team was pushing down mid. but they all recalled to fight me and there only ranged champ was a Varus who decided that going into my Melee range would be somehow to his benefit. **And then Jarvan came**. He ended up trapping his whole team in my Spin2win range which quickly resulted in their Nid, Varus and Zed melting. all they had left was the low hp J4 and  a pretty tanky Braum who was the villain so he got destroyed pretty quick. So, with all of his team dead J4 decided to drop the ult and run but there was only one skill I had left to use.

_**JUSTICE!**_
i got my first penta by playing ryze! beat that people!
Only Pentakills Ive gotten are with Fiddlesticks, Olaf, Rumble, and Ziggs. A bunch of unofficials as Veigar though (not quick enough but almost).

Not all of them, no. I do remember many, and especially the first one I got in a ranked game.

Good times.

I've had probably nearly 20 pentas. I had an unusual one 2 days ago. I was Jax top lane but went 0/4 in lane thanks to being camped (and I mean hard camped) against my mundo opponent. But, I got a cull and still decently outfarmed Mundo. Then we started grouping and I got kills everywhere. In total I had 15 kills, this consisted of:

1x single kill
1x double kill
1x triple kill
1x quadra kill
1x penta kill

This is like the full house of multi kills! I'm pretty sure not many people have had 15 kills consisting of that before!
Edit, proof yada yada: http://matchhistory.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/EUW1/2618535969/38000436?tab=overview

Yes:
Yi spamming Q in a team fight in aram
Yi spamming Q in a team fight in aram
Yi spamming Q in a team fight in aram
all of them, season 3, AP yi

Malzahar, pressing E and then moving around the team fight, aram season 4
And also in season 4, AD Vi, penta kill in aram at lv6-7 (aka: last hitting the enemy team). Sadly game lost.

Well, its kind of easy for me to remember them :))
I got 4 Quadra's, Four freaking quadras. Every single penta was stolen from me.

I only remember two, my first ever pentakill when I was still a noob playing bot games. It was with Annie against intermediate bots. Of course that's nothing, but at the time I was so fucking happy.


The other one that I remember was with Twisted Fate and I remember it because I threw a perfect Wildcard (after I already had a double) and each card killed a member, granting me the penta.


I know I have had two or three pentas with Darius, but I don't remember them. I also have a vague memory of a Morgana pentakill.

The others I have absolutely no idea.


Edit: Oh, just remembered another one with Cassiopeia. I kited extremely well with my poison and Twin Fangs and had WotA for spell vamp. I would've died wasn't for the friendly Janna (I think, might've been another champion). I'm really gonna miss WotA on Cassiopeia.
Well i have about 5 or 6, and i remember all of them since support mains dont get much pentakills.(not all when playing support)

I remember all my pentas

1 on Annie (yeh, it was pretty boring, AOE stun, AOE dmg, Penta)
1 on Ahri (in a game where my team was feeding too!)
1 on Galio (1st time Galio as well!)
3 on Darius (in my defence! One of them was a beautifully outplayed 1v5, where I dodged all the skillshots.)
1 on Vayne (Got the last kill just before the Nexus exploded)
2 on Kassadin (in the same ARAM game. Enemy Viktor got a penta aswell XD)
